website_summaries.verdict: A good choice for users who need easy installation and a lightweight design, but it doesn't quite live up to the functionality of more rugged models.
pros: Lightweight and fairly straightforward to install
x 50 ft. hose included in the sleek-looking enclosed design
cons: Roller mechanism has been known to stick, lock up, or not recoil smoothly
Long-term durability is questionable considering the plastic construction

customer_reviews.title: 2+ years later no issues!
customer_reviews.text: I have 4 of these, 2.5 years in service so far in a high volume auto shop at a consistent 175psi They don't retract perfectly but does help in not getting smacked in the jewels .
customer_reviews.author: Vdubnluvn

customer_reviews.title: A waste of money and time.
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe what a pain in the ass this thing is. Every time I go to reel it back up I have issues, I have to spend five minutes trying get the hose back in. I have never had this much trouble with a hose reel before, not even a cheap one from Habor Freight. It would have been easier and cheaper to just get a hose and roll it up each time I used it. This thing saves no time and was a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: His Stigness

customer_reviews.title: Spring broke first time spooling it out to 30'
customer_reviews.text: I had this in my garage overhead for the first couple years. It always retracted just fine as I'd only ever take out 10-15ft. I moved into a shop space and the first time I pulled the hose out to around 30' the unit would not retract at all. I ended up opening it up to see if I could tighten the spring and the actual wind up spring has snapped. I've no idea how that could even happen. I'll give a 5 star if the manufacturer sends me a new spring. Otherwise...stick clear of this unit.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Nice idea...not great execution
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because it was reasonably priced and from a name that I've had good luck with previously. The idea is sound, but the execution is lacking, however. The hose lock while spooling out or in is very hit or miss and just today I noticed that there's an air leak inside the reel somewhere. I only bought this in February and it's only seen very limited use in a woodworking shop that's generally kept clean and organized. I'll have to keep it disconnected when not actually in use going forward and try to locate the leak and repair. Disappointing, but it is what it is. Returning it isn't an option at this point several months later.
customer_reviews.author: J. Becker

customer_reviews.title: The one thing I hate
customer_reviews.text: The only thing that I hate is that I didn't buy this sooner. I bought a hose without a reel a long time ago and I avoided using my compressor just so that I didn't have to deal with that stupid hose and how hard it was to roll back up. This thing is great! I use it on all of the cars in the driveway from the spot I have it in the garage. The hose is soft and flexible and seems durable, the reel is not too powerful but pulls the hose just enough and it is easy to catch it. I 100% recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Adam Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product
customer_reviews.text: My old reel took a dump and stopped retracting in my home garage. So I was looking at the Flexzilla hose now for a little while and decided to pull the trigger. The hose ends are anodized and work well. If your hose end takes a dump you will need to get a special kit from Flexzilla just type in "Flexzilla hose repair" and you will find it. Found that one out later but so be it. The hose does not link up and unlike any of the other guys my hose retracts just fine even with the air pumped up. So that was not an issue for me.
customer_reviews.author: RichardEGagne

customer_reviews.title: Flexzilla Retractable Enclosed Plastic Air Hose Reel, 3/8 in. x 50 ft
customer_reviews.text: Ive used Flexzilla hose at work because it is very flexible and lightweight. I love the hoses but the reel sucks bad! It always tangles inside and wont full retract the hose. Ive tried multiple angles and other ways to get it to roll back up with no luck.
customer_reviews.author: H. Lopez

customer_reviews.title: VERY POOR QUALITY! DO NOT BUY. ALSO will not warranty it if you have an issue with it!
customer_reviews.text: VERY POOR QUALITY!. Hose cracked less than a year old. I sent it in for warranty and I was told by the manufacture that the hose is not designed for daily use or use in fixing automobile daily. I was told the unit is only design for home use and the hose needs to be washed off after every time it's used and retracted!!!!! Bad customer service too!
customer_reviews.author: Pat A

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the money
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this thing, I’ve had it for about 3 years now, never an issue, hold plenty of high quality line, rugged in build, retracts nicely and stores the hose cleanly, nor more tripping over you air hose or anything like that.
customer_reviews.author: Gun951

customer_reviews.title: Gets slow at the finish line!
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing the hose is soft and easy to deal with in a garage environment around tools and things on bench. The only issue I have with this is that when the hose gets to the last 3 feet is slows down and I have to almost push it up. I have tried extending the length of the hose and then letting it reel back in with some success but still compared to my electrical cord, this thing just lags that last 3 feet.
customer_reviews.author: John A Merlino

customer_reviews.title: Internal Leak
customer_reviews.text: After a month or so, there is a leak on the interior connection forcing me to disconnect from my compressor when I am not using the air. The leak is not so bad that I want to take the coil apart, but is bad enough that the compressor (5 gallon Makita) will has to turn on once every twenty minutes to compensate for the lost air. The recoil mechanism does work well.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Einstein

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly so far. Before i got this gadget, I struggled with a tangled hoses -always a mess and not convenient. This reel works great. Long hose comes out and retracts easily. Nice mounting bracket that pivots so does not take much space when not in use Hose and fittings are good quality. Only haggle -Short hose only 3 feet, could be a bit longer to get to compressor. Using it in my garage for tires and it reaches outside too with nice 50' length.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice hose reel
customer_reviews.text: I've only had it a couple of weeks but I've already used this several times. The hose is very flexible. The reel latches easily after the hose has been pulled out. And the release & coil up is nice and smooth. The product feels very nicely made. This was a replacement of a Campbell Hausfield hose reel which was ok but this Flexzilla has a longer hose and the housing seems to be sturdier.
customer_reviews.author: S. J. M.

customer_reviews.title: The hose is fine, the reel leaks air.
customer_reviews.text: Mine leaked air at the ball joint. Not enough so that you could hear it, but I wondered why the compressor would come on so often. I cut the hose off and threw the reel away. Also - Flexzilla sells nice high-flow fittings for their hoses. But the ball joint on the reel is not hi-flow, so the reel negates the usefulness of any hi-flow components. Would not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hose and reel case seem to be good quality, but it's very picky on whether or ...
customer_reviews.text: Hose and reel case seem to be good quality, but it's very picky on whether or not the entire length rewinds inside the case. The hose has a tendency to bunch up on one part of the reel and bind in the case, requiring pulling it out and hand-directing it to wind more level. There is a wipe-on lubrication provided with the hose that helps the problem, but requires a consistent application (every month or so) to keep it working well. I expected a more fool-proof rewind with less complications for the higher price of this reel.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This thing works great. I don't usually buy brands I haven't heard ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing works great. I don't usually buy brands I haven't heard of, but I took a chance here and it paid off. Great price, and it works very well. The hose retracts well and fully extends to the whole length of the hose. I've mounted it at the front corner of my garage so it can be near an otherwise inaccessible outlet that I plug the air compressor into, and it reaches to the third bay to fill the lawn mower's tires when needed. Overall solid build, decent hose, and nice mounting options.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Decent balue, but one concern
customer_reviews.text: Generally pleased with the product and it accomplishes what I need in my two-car garage. My only concern is that it’s often difficult to get the line to spool up entirely so it seems like the return spring is barely adequate and the drum is barely spacious enough to hold all the line. Almost always I have to pull many feet of line out and re-spool several times before I can get all the line spooked into the drum.
customer_reviews.author: Buff4Lo

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy with this hose reel
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I'm happy with this hose reel. It makes working around the garage with air tools much easier. The fittings seem solid & the unit is durable. I have noticed a few issues in trying to get this thing to reel up all the way (why I didn't give it 5 stars), but not every time & not enough that it's an issue for me. I saw that there's a fix for this but it's not enough of a problem for me that I want to mess with it; it's fine as-is. I would buy this item again.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Weaver

customer_reviews.title: Great Product but too much hose
customer_reviews.text: I really like the hose reel, it is well constructed and functions smoothly with very crisp and positive stops. The only issue I had with it right out of the box is that there is too much hose in the reel and the retract binds up if the hose happens to stack up on one side, which seemed almost impossible to prevent on my ceiling mount. I took the reel and hose it to my local auto parts store and cut off about 12 feet of hose, crimped a new end onto the hose and it has never bound up again.
customer_reviews.author: Derek K Bradfield

customer_reviews.title: Works well, but see below
customer_reviews.text: The main thing I don't like about this is that when pulling it out, it doesn't stay pulled out at reasonable points. I have to pull and check, pull some more, check, pull some more, and it might finally catch. Very annoying. I have it mounted on a wall in my garage above the compressor. It works fine otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: J. Alberts

customer_reviews.title: Very nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: This Chinese made hose reel is quite a bit lighter than my all steel one, and at first I was skeptical. But it works well, the pivot function is nice, and the rewind spring works adequately. Spring could be a little stronger... Hose is of an interesting material, dirt brushed off it easily and the extra flexibility is convenient, but not a big advantage in my application. Fittings seem made of plastic, and that concerned me, but they tightened up fine and sealed properly. I'd say this is a very good choice in a light duty hose reel. Nice that it came ready to use, no assembly required other than mounting it, and that's when the lighter weight was helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: Always checks for leaks!
customer_reviews.text: Mine did come with a loose internal fitting, that’s why I docked this as I had to take it apart and tighten it to stop a leak. Other than that, it’s sturdy, looks nice and retracts well.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Mine Only lasted 3 years.
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for 3 years. Then it developed an air leak inside. Contacted the Flexzilla folks they said there warranty is only good for 2 years and they don't sell replacement parts for the inside. So just under a 100 bucks for a hose that's only lasted 3 years. I guess i'll try one of the other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Mario Escajeda

customer_reviews.title: Not a real flexzilla
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure what’s up with the “Flexzilla Legacy” line, but I don’t think it’s really Flexzilla. I have a short hose with dryer by flexzilla, and it performs completely differently from this. You can’t kink the real flexzilla, whereas you can kink this.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Purdy

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I've had this hose for about three months. It is already problematic in retracting and it has developed a leak at the coupling at the end of the hose reel and this coupling has some sort of press fit and cannot be removed so there is no way to fix the leak.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy A

customer_reviews.title: Worth Every Dollar
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. I have not had any of the retract issues that some others have reported. I bought this back in Feb and have not had any issues. The only thing I don't like about the hose is that it is bright green. It looks really nice when new, but shows every bit of dirt and grease that it picks up from use. It's a small complaint and not a big issue for a garage, but I like keeping my tools looking nice.
customer_reviews.author: James Weber

customer_reviews.title: Hose reel doesn’t reel up completely
customer_reviews.text: I’ll keep this short & simple. Most everything about it I like. The hose doesn’t kink and is very flexible. At first the reel worked flawless and after a short while once I’m close to reeling up the hose completely it starts to get stuck. I have to tug and help force feed the hose back in. It’s getting a little frustrating. Other than that I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Teran

customer_reviews.title: I got the longer hose version and one seems to not draw the hose in all the way like the other
customer_reviews.text: Have had these, I have two, for over 6 months now and they work well. I got the longer hose version and one seems to not draw the hose in all the way like the other. There are some reviews that discusses adjusting it. I need to try this on the one unit to see if it fixes the problem. It only has this issue with the last 3 or so feet of hose. Seems like its a tight fit in there.
customer_reviews.author: VictorM

customer_reviews.title: Can't Roll Up hose!
customer_reviews.text: I understand other reviewers have stated the same thing and their solution was to wind the coil up tighter or release the air from the hose prior to roll-up. What a garbage design that requires modification or air release to properly work. The true problem is that the hose is too long for the enclosure. So to properly fix this you would have to cut 20ft off the hose. What a joke. Flexzilla needs to take this off the market and rethink their design/engineering process. At the very least they should test their products before production and shipment. DO NOT BUY!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Auto Shop

customer_reviews.title: After one year with this reel, my recommendation is to buy something else.  It just does not work.
customer_reviews.text: Huge disappointment. I like how flexible the hose is. The reel does not have enough spring to reel in the hose. There is no user adjustment as with higher end reels to correct this. The manufacturer just says to lube the hose to make it work. It is very frustrating to use in a pro shop.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Convenient
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to the garage workshop. Having this reel is far more user friendly than my old, stiff air hose that finds a way to tangle itself no matter how careful I am. With the addition of this reel, cleaning up is extremely easy and is conveniently stored out of the way. The one downfall is the length of the lead-in hose that connects to the compressor. If the hose was a foot or two longer, it would allow more flexibility in mounting locations when placing it by a large compressor. I have it mounted above my 30 gallon compressor, and have to position the compressor just right to ensure the lead-in hose will reach and not be strained.
customer_reviews.author: Z.ind

customer_reviews.title: Works just fine
customer_reviews.text: Thought about adjusting the spring as recommended by others. I decided to ride it out first. I open the regulator everytime before draining the tank and take a rag to wipe the hose as it goes through. Not once have I had an issue with retracting. This thing has made my life so much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Hose burst upon first use.
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get this flexible hose, other crimped too easily. Upon first use the hose burst. I tried to return and needed to wait on seller. Well over the suggested time to hear back I have heard nothing. I can't seem to file a claim either. Don't purchase if you need a good working hose with at least medium pressure.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Bought Two, one doesn't retract all the way.
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these, and one of them stopped retracting all the way in the first week. It may have been damaged by over extending it by someone, but even so, it was disappointing to have it damaged so quickly. The other one has worked well the whole time though which is why this gets three stars instead of two.
customer_reviews.author: Max Whitson

customer_reviews.title: Not great - ok product
customer_reviews.text: It works - for right now. The hose does not real up all the way back in after it has been pulled out. My greatest concern are the connectors are made of plastic, and plastics threads screwing into brass fittings - I don't think this product will last very long. They should make those connectors out of metal.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick A. Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: Leaked
customer_reviews.text: This thing leaked air as soon as I hooked it up. I should have plugged it into the compressor before I went to all the trouble of hanging it from the ceiling. I would not recommend buying this one.
customer_reviews.author: A.M.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install, works smoothly, no issues with retraction
customer_reviews.text: This unit works great. I have it hung from an 11' workshop ceiling and have had no problems with pulling out the hose or having it retract...no adjustments have been necessary. I haven't had any leakage that I can determine. Very pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: DCR

customer_reviews.title: I should have bought it much sooner
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, easy to use. The hose is very flexible. Very good quality. Compressed air comes handy for a lot of purposes (e.g. blowing out your various vacuum cleaners etc). In the past I sometimes hesitated using the compressor, with firing up the compressor, unwinding, and then rewinding the hoses (plural) being such a chore. Now I have mounted the reel outside with a permanent connection to the compressor I flip a switch to turn on the compressor and just pull out the hose.
customer_reviews.author: Max Klepp

customer_reviews.title: Love This Hose
customer_reviews.text: Bought for our son We have one in our farm shop for 8 years and going strong Love the soft flexible hose even in below zero temps it remains soft and flexible Recoils will Will definitely buy again
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy D

customer_reviews.title: Good hose reel, I hope it proves durable.
customer_reviews.text: Good hose reel, I hope it proves durable. Most of my other hose reels have been metal, and had exposed reel so you could see the hose and fix any issues on the inside. I am hoping this one doesn't have issues inside, because it isn't open and would prove a challenge to fix any hose issues inside. I like how flexible it is. As others have mentioned, it is covered in silicone so don't use it in a shop where you also paint.
customer_reviews.author: Flyinlow

customer_reviews.title: Save your money and move on!
customer_reviews.text: I thought this would have been a great addition to my shop. I set it all up, tightened all fitting, which you have to rotate the entire assembly because the fittings it comes with are crimped in place. Then after all the set up, the factory crimped fittings leaking, not just a little but a lot, non-usable. Save your money and don’t waste your time.
customer_reviews.author: Rory Crothers

customer_reviews.title: Reel issues. FIXED.
customer_reviews.text: The hose itself is great. But the reel itself does not retract very well. I’ll probably have to crack open the cover to see what’s wrong with it. UPDATE: wheel assembly fixed itself after pulling the hose all the way out. It’s been great having it in the shop. I recommend this reel to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Roy Orosco

customer_reviews.title: Good product for light use and homeowners
customer_reviews.text: This reel is as described. The construction is sturdy and the components are appropriate for its intended use. For my purposes it is performing well and should last a long time. I am using the reel between two and three times per week.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Not so good
customer_reviews.text: Did not react fully even after performing the spring mod. Returned and bought a different brand
customer_reviews.author: DMS1960

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: And love this thing. I was prepared to take it apart and tighten the spring. It had already been done!! I believe the company fixed this issue, and is now sending out units that work extremely well right out of the box!!
customer_reviews.author: Serenity Knives

customer_reviews.title: At first it had me confused, applied air pressure ...
customer_reviews.text: At first it had me confused, applied air pressure, unrolled part of the hose, then went to allow it to roll back up and it had issues. You may have to unroll the entire hose when air pressure is applied and hose expands and retract it for the hose to roll up properly otherwise it works great
customer_reviews.author: Ryan W

customer_reviews.title: Need a replacement only after 4 months of use
customer_reviews.text: I've had this product for 4 months now. At first it worked great now for the past 2 months the mechanism that locks the hose in place will release on its own without warning knocking down anything in its path. Someone could get hurt with the heavy air coupler slinging around as it spools in fast.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice low priced hose reel unit. The hose is very soft and flexible. As others have stated out of the box the retraction tension is very light. A little bit of feeding is required. But as others have stated there is a modification that could be done to the unit to increase the tension.
customer_reviews.author: Dean B.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t hold up to periodic use.
customer_reviews.text: After 9 months of periodic use it no longer retracts all the way. I have about 6’ that hangs down with the stopper, and it always leaves about 2’ out when I try to retract it. After messing with it fir a few minutes it will finally retract the remainder of the hose.
customer_reviews.author: Infidel

customer_reviews.title: Horribly restrictive to air flow.
customer_reviews.text: Not happy with this product. The build quality seems pretty good, but it is too restrictive. It will not keep up with my 1/2 inch harbor freight impact wrench. I believe that the tiny plastic swivel inside is the issue.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Crap Hose
customer_reviews.text: With the first 3 times using it the hose failed under pressure. All I use is a small hotdog compressor, 100 psi max. Two very small and perfectly round pinholes now loses all my air. As I try to replace the hose I make the mistake of opening the wrong compartment and the coil/band explodes out the container. Going to Northern Tools to buy a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Jac Book Club

customer_reviews.title: Excellent price!
customer_reviews.text: Nothing negative to say. It doesnt always wheel back in because the hose runs out of space inside so you have to move the hose left and right to allow it to be even
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: About that suggested “modification”......
customer_reviews.text: Read a lot of people in these reviews want to do some kind of modification to make the unit retract better. One reviewer said he installed a shut off valve and when not pressurized, the unit retracts great without modification. My message is the same: with a shut off valve installed, the unit retracts flawlessly. Probably easier than doing the modification. Five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Doherty

customer_reviews.title: I like this hose, extends and retracts easily.
customer_reviews.text: Works as described. Hose is flexible even when cold. Had to learn how to get he hose to latch when pulled out. Need to listen to ball bearings, when they start clicking, releasing the hose will latch in position. To release pull until ball bearings are not clicking and the hose retracts easily.
customer_reviews.author: Harold Littlejohn

customer_reviews.title: Hose reel
customer_reviews.text: Like the hose and reel easy to use. I’ve had it mounted in my shed for car repair, but after 4 or six months a bubble formed in the hose and popped while I was working Underneath a vehicle
customer_reviews.author: Bud

customer_reviews.title: Flexzilla Hose is great!, but the reels need some improvements
customer_reviews.text: These don't work very well mounted to the wall. We have two of these wall mounted and one ceiling mounted. The two wall mounted ones hardly ever retract the hose all the way back in and almost always need help spooling the hose back up into the reel properly. Flexzilla Hose is great!, but the reels need some improvements.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Conner

customer_reviews.title: Works exactly as it should.
customer_reviews.text: Works. Works. Works. Decent quality. None of the problems I read with the other brands. Since I just needed it to work...and not Marry...it is perfect. Does exactly what I need it to do without tugging, anger issues, or eye-rolls. So I bought Three.
customer_reviews.author: KR Kingston

customer_reviews.title: Seems good but..
customer_reviews.text: Did the “fix” for not retracting and is working good. Time will tell if it holds up. Will update review if problems occur. Should be “fixed” from the factory...
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Adjust tension FIRST
customer_reviews.text: Follow the instructions given by the man who posted a video. Adjust the tension BEFORE mounting and the pull out / retractions works just fine. Great to get my air hose off the ground.
customer_reviews.author: Umpire.20

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy this one
customer_reviews.text: Hose is great but the case is made very cheaply. Plastic internal parts with crimped hose no threads.
customer_reviews.author: Terri Anne

customer_reviews.title: Quality unit, better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: Easy to mount on the wall. Easy to use. Hefty hose is flexible, kink free, and good quality. Retraction spring is powerful--you could let go of the hose and let fly, but don't! Great addition to the home garage.
customer_reviews.author: Arky Pete

customer_reviews.title: ... this for 1+ year and it has been working great, no leaks in any part of the line
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for 1+ year and it has been working great, no leaks in any part of the line. I used it to pull up tile in the kitchen (~600 sq ft) and it worked great. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: ecth

customer_reviews.title: This item is recommend!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, hose reel seems to be made very well. Hose is rubber, not the cheap plastic coated type. Installed fittings and connected to compressor no leaks were present. Only negative thong I have to say is that it didn't come with fittings or mounting hardware. Otherwise for the price this is an excellent choice. I also purchased the cord reel to match.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Made a portable detail mount it works amazing air hose is always nicee 👌
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Pearson

customer_reviews.title: Like other reviews
customer_reviews.text: Like other reviews. Hose & reel soaked in silicone spray. I was going to use for paint shop at home, but returned instead. I don't want to take a chance on ruining a paint job.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Very nice reel and hose for home use
customer_reviews.text: Finally found the perfect air compressor hose reel in this one. Perfect hose and reel function. easy to use and mount, love this thing. The last one I had was too heavy, this one is much lighter, but still nice quality for price. Careful when connecting hose to fittings, the quality of hose ends is average plastic, not metal.
customer_reviews.author: mac_camper

customer_reviews.title: It cool Maybe cuz my dad had a real good one ...
customer_reviews.text: It cool Maybe cuz my dad had a real good one at his construction yard is why I'm not super impressed. The last 5 feet never goes in pisses me off Its not junk But not great Thanks Ron
customer_reviews.author: woodpile331

customer_reviews.title: Great hose, very flexible and does not get tangled ...
customer_reviews.text: Great hose, very flexible and does not get tangled like most hoses. Reel works great with no issues. Has been in my garage used regularly for over 6 months and no issues at all. Would definitally buy again if I had to.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Game changer
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough good things about flexzilla hoses. If you've even worked in a shop or dealt with any other composition of air hose then you know how difficult and annoying they can be. The flexzilla hose is superior in every way. Won't bunch uon or become stiff in the cold. Add in the retractable swivel reek and it really becomes a game changer.
customer_reviews.author: Ariana D

customer_reviews.title: Super flexible, light weight and great build quality
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this hose to replace my stiff pvc hose and have used it for a few weeks and have been extremely happy with it. It's super light, extremely flexible and it lays very flat on the floor. I use it for painting and automotive repair work and am very satisfied. The build quality of the hose and billet fittings are great. I wish i could find at least 1 negative but I can't find anything bad.
customer_reviews.author: michael a athearn

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this and so do the kids. Pulls easy and locks. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: It was hard to get fittings on hose ends to seal. Hose does not hold air after being isolated from the system. Took the cover off from inlet connection and found two screws loose wherehose goes into reel and one screw stripped. Hose must be leaking air where it attaches to reel. Not impressed with quality.
customer_reviews.author: Larry D Archer Sr.

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy it
customer_reviews.text: This product is garbage I don't recommend buying. I bought my first one and it leaked internally at the fittings. So I sent it back and got replacement. Well that one leaked just as bad if not worse. Needless to say I threw it in the trash. "Garbage"
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Product seems to be lightly built. Won’t retract very well after less than one week of use. Less than impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Hilltop1

customer_reviews.title: Best hose I have used yet in a sub tropic ...
customer_reviews.text: Best hose I have used yet in a sub tropic envioroment. Here in Okinawa we get a lot of hot dry weather and a lot of dampness in the rain season. Hose has yet to get hard and cause issues. And unlike craftsman and others I have used these are well worth the money. I have 3 and 2 are outside still havent had a spring issue yet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Boyfriend has been wanting a Flexzilla for years
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my boyfriend after years of him wanting a Flexzilla hose (could never find them in department stores). Not only does he love it- but being the super tidy fella that he is, the retractable hose reel makes him love it even more! When he does not have a reason to use his Flexzilla, he finds or invents new reasons to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Carli

customer_reviews.title: Only had it in used a week and the recoil ...
customer_reviews.text: Only had it in used a week and the recoil doesnt go in all the way and there is an air leak. When hooked to the compressor it leaks so the the compressor recycles.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Improve your product description.
customer_reviews.text: You need to indicate the fitting dimension of 1/4" npt. The reel is sluggish. If you need an enclosed reel its decent but the spring tension is pretty weak. They also include a silicone wipe to "maintain" the hose. This seems like a step I dont want to add into my shop.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Weak recoil strength
customer_reviews.text: Hung from ceiling and very challenging to retract... not powerful enough to retract well... hose is very flexy causing more friction... other than that good... but that’s basically all I bought this for so um.... yeah... 2 Stars
customer_reviews.author: Cornhole Collective

customer_reviews.title: This is a great air hose and reel
customer_reviews.text: This is a great air hose and reel. The reel works just like it is supposed to, and the air hose never tangles and retracts very easily. If you are looking for a hose reel, buy this one. You will not be sorry!
customer_reviews.author: Mike H.

customer_reviews.title: Best If Hung On The Wall
customer_reviews.text: The Flexzilla is a great way to avoid that tangled and twisted air hose mess. It is a large unit, so be prepared to hang it on the wall. The lock mechanism to stop the hose from retracting works most of the time.
customer_reviews.author: Russell

customer_reviews.title: Retractable hose!
customer_reviews.text: Hands down one of our favorites in the pole barn! Keeps the hose up and out of the way. Easy to use and easy to put away. Would highly recommend if you're looking for convenience.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality retractable hose for the money
customer_reviews.text: These are the best bang for the buck retractable light duty air hoses. The hose is durable, and does not get stuck as easy as some other brands I've tried.
customer_reviews.author: Ozer

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be a decent product.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Retractor works well, no leaks. Swivels on the base. Seems to be a good quality hose for the price. I bought one from the local box store and it was a PoC. leaked right out of the box. this one seems better made for about the same price.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Twain

customer_reviews.title: WORKS QUITE WELL
customer_reviews.text: Works quite well. The hose really is light and flexible. It does get dirty easily, being neon and made with that matte material. And as other users have posted, the spring mechanism isn't the most durable. It recoils most of the time without issue, but sometimes, you have to really extend it again and return guiding it to have the whole hose make it back into the reel. Seems to work ok so far but will report back if it shows any real wear or completely dies. Not bad given the price.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Works every time
customer_reviews.text: Well made. Used to reduce clutter in garage. Quality connections.
customer_reviews.author: js12278

customer_reviews.title: Very nice reel.
customer_reviews.text: Very great reel and the hose is awesome. Does have some trouble reeling in since it isn't guided so you kind of have to hand roll or it will bunch up on one side. Otherwise it is a great air hose roll. Can help to cut off air and empty hose and then roll it up.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: It's much harder to pull the hose in and out and it makes a rattling noise now like a handful of rocks in a plastic cup
customer_reviews.text: Reel worked for about 2 uses then the bearing in the reel messed up. It's much harder to pull the hose in and out and it makes a rattling noise now like a handful of rocks in a plastic cup.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Reagan

customer_reviews.title: Garbage: Don’t buy this
customer_reviews.text: Hard to install. Doesn’t lock at the length you want and doesn’t retract. Takes too much fiddling around to use. Since I’ve had it too long to be able to return it I’m going to throw it in the trash and chalk it up to experience.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Ramsey

customer_reviews.title: Nice and flexible
customer_reviews.text: Nice and flexible, however the spring return is weak and rarely if ever pulls it back all the way. Usually leaving 2ft of hose hanging or so, even with helping it by pushing the hose up.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas J. Murray

customer_reviews.title: I was concerned after reading reviews but I have not had an issue with mine
customer_reviews.text: No issues. The Flexzilla hose is Awesome! The ZillaReel I was concerned about after reading reviews but I have not had an issue with mine.
customer_reviews.author: Hermanator

customer_reviews.title: My husband loves it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for his workshop and he absolutely loves it. I would recommend this as a great gift for Father’s Day
customer_reviews.author: BARGAIN HUNTER

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Works just as it supposed to. If I needed another one I wouldn't hesitate to buy it
customer_reviews.author: D.p.

customer_reviews.title: great hose reel
customer_reviews.text: great hose reel, easy to use and the hose is really flexible. much better then a rubber or PVC hose.
customer_reviews.author: daisy lani

customer_reviews.title: Hose is great, reel makes noise after I let it go ...
customer_reviews.text: Hose is great, reel makes noise after I let it go in too quickly, sounds like the spring is broken.
customer_reviews.author: Product tester

customer_reviews.title: Air hose get stuck every single time. Terrible design.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely terrible design. As soon as you unreal the hose and then go to reel it back in, it gets stuck every single time. They should’ve stop making this product and figure out how to re-engineer this enclosed air hose reel.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob G.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and compact
customer_reviews.text: Perfect and compact. Retracted holds up well and doesn't keep wanting to reel in every time you pull it out for a little extra length
customer_reviews.author: Ducisnoop

customer_reviews.title: The host stop mechanism is hokey
customer_reviews.text: Like a lot about this item. However Th hose stop mechanism doesn’t work unless I pull at least 12-15 feet of hose out. Outside of that, seems solid.
customer_reviews.author: Plus1Golf

customer_reviews.title: ... as a Christmas gift and the recipient is very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Gave this as a Christmas gift and the recipient is very happy with it! Recommended highly. Great price too.
customer_reviews.author: mammasawnT

customer_reviews.title: Amazing and works
customer_reviews.text: Amazing and works. Retracts hose with just the right amount of tension. You do have to guide it back and forth when winding hose back in - especially if the hose is under pressure with air inside. It did have some silicone lubricant on the hose but I just wiped it off before 1st use.
customer_reviews.author: R

product_meta.title: Flexzilla Retractable Enclosed Plastic Air Hose Reel, 3/8 in. x 50 ft, Heavy Duty, Lightweight, Hybrid, ZillaGreen - L8250FZ
product_meta.description: Size:3/8" (inches) x 50' (feet)Flexzilla is a revolutionary hose featuring a Premium Hybrid Polymer material that redefines flexibility. Flexzilla hose characteristics offer zero memory allowing it to lay-flat exactly where you drop it and won't work against you during operation or coiling after use. Flexzilla offers extreme all-weather flexibility, even in sub-zero conditions.
feature_bullets: EXTREMELY DURABLE - Made from UV stabilized polypropylene
FLEXZILLA HOSE INLCUDED - Features Legacy’s 3/8 in. x 50 ft. exclusive Flexzilla Premium Hybrid Polymer hose and lead-in hose

EASY TO USE - The auto retract/ latch hose mechanism simplifies every job by keeping excess hose out of the working space. The positive latching mechanism locks the hose automatically in 18 in. intervals. The adjustable hose stopper allows the user to increase or decrease the length of the hose that remains when the hose is fully retracted
EASY TO STORE - The reel can be mounted to the wall or ceiling. The swivel mounting bracket pivots in the direction of your work
150 POUNDS PER SQUARE INCH - Maximum working pressure at 70 degrees F

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars545 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
